title: hollowdoor
author: hollowdoor
content: recently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: First thing first, the person who helped you create the Bitcoin wallet, does he know your private key? Good people or not, don't trust anyone in this world. If you have learned how to create the wallet, I suggest you to create a new one and get rid of the old one. It doesn't take money to create a new wallet. In order to save your privacy, you should always stay cautious. If you are using a software wallet, I suggest you to move to a hardware wallet. It is the best option to secure your assets. It will cost you some money, but that's just one time investment which will keep you safe for the rest of your life. Second thing is that, do not back up your secret key online, never share it with anyone, always keep it safe and learn how to encrypt those key before backing up. If you do these two steps, then you can move on to buying and storing your Bitcoin. There's no ending when it comes to learning. And slow and steady always wins the race. Learn it little by little and don't rush it. You will eventually get to the top for sure.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: It seems that English is not your native language. Perhaps you need to write in your local language or to better explain your idea.The beginning is always difficult, but the content related to Bitcoin, which is available as open source, you will find everything you need here https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information.html. If you want more sources, you can read the sources mentioned in this topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5156874.0happy learning journey.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.It’s confusing why you are asking now about forum functionality while you are already joining on bounty campaign and made few post during 2018 while you are acting that you totally don’t know everything when you come back from long inactivity.Regardless of the real reason. Beginners and Help is the perfect for you since it contains a lot of useful thread to guide you on all of your questions about how to start in the forum.List of useful Threads!

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.I hope you created the wallet yourself, if you didn't I wouldn't advise you to store your Bitcoin on the wallet because the person might know your seed phrase and steal your coins. Create a new wallet and transfer your funds. Remember to write your seed phrase on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere very safe. Below are some helpful links where to learn about Bitcoin.https://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbook.The Internet of Money.https://cointelegraph.com/learn/what-is-bitcoin-a-beginners-guide-to-the-worlds-first-cryptocurrency.

comments.author: hollowdoor
comments.body: I hope you created the wallet yourself, if you didn't I wouldn't advise you to store your Bitcoin on the wallet because the person might know your seed phrase and steal your coins. Create a new wallet and transfer your funds. Remember to write your seed phrase on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere very safe. comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.Its mean you created account on this forum a long time ago that's why you called your self old age but a kid because you don't know about this forum. I will say, you did find a unique way to say I am new here and help me to learn this forum. I have seen many new members coming here and saying they are new here or referred by some friend and how they can grow here, and ask for useful links or suggestions, but your way of saying that is unique and I liked that.By the way, there is nothing to afraid of, you will learn things if you will spend some time here, if you will not spend some time in understanding the rules first then you might not find useful things. The best way to get familiar with new platforms is to learn there rules by reading then not by disobeying or learning by doing mistakes again and again. Work like a smart man instead of a donkey who don't use his own brain. I am not calling you donkey jusst using it as an example. Which means, you should first learn the rules of this forum to stay here, you can learn them by clicking on help button and then visit each thread or topic to get the most of the knowledge about this forum and after 1 week you will learn a lot about it.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: I highly doubt that you're still a kid OP, it kind of feels like you're trying to be as sensational as possible and if you're really still just a kid, how the hell are you able to navigate this forum, I'm not saying it's a complicated forum to navigate, it's just that it's weird that you're announcing your age. But if you really are a kid, then I guess I'll have to congratulate you because that means you're a part of the people that have a high IQ and you just feign ignorance so people aren't trying to get in your face too much and investing in bitcoin at such a young age would also mean that your parents care about you and your future.

comments.author: syedakhlaque
comments.body: The best way for you to start is to start your business with light trading. As you learn this work. So keep increasing the trading capital. But it should be gradual. As this is your learning phase, investing too much is not advisable. Also, spend a reasonable amount on stocking. And coins that have a low market value. And it is likely to increase in the future. Buy it. So that you can earn better profit from it. Also focus on mining and try to learn its psychology and methodology. In this way, I hope you will be successful in future.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: I believe the person that put you through to help you download your wallet told you to write down the seeds phrase because, if you fail to write down your seeds phrase, if anything happens to your phone or laptop you stored in your wallet, you will not have access to your money anymore. Don't forget to apply long term hodling in your coins because, the real bull run is about to hit the market for those that newly started the BTC investment to have story to tell those who don't still believe that  BTC investment is favourable.If you are not up to 18 years, it will be difficult for you to grow fast in this community but the BTC investment require potential skills to know when to buy and hodl for the right opportunity to come before you can sell to make some money that will increase your capital which is the major thing you need to achieve fast.

comments.author: Assface16678
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.The best way is for you to surf this forum, before you engage in investing in bitcoin or any other cryptocurrency you should know first the basics or thing you should know, and you are in the right place, because this forum has all the informations you need, you could ask to other members just like this, so i think this is the best place for you to start, and I'm sure you have thr means and resources to gather more informations about crypto currency, you could search up online or watch videos or something, and if you plan to invest then you should know first on what method you want to earn, there are a lot of ways to earn in crypto, can be by holding assets, trading, faucet, gambling crypto but not recommended, or you could do signature campaign here in forum for starters and many more ways, you just have to become resourceful, spend time and effort and also patience to build your experience.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.It's very terrible practice.Quoteim a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.Welcome.Quotenow i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.From your registration date, it is in 2018, five years ago. I wonder what did you do during the last five years and how did you missed the last bull run without joining this magic market.There are many free resources to learn and creating a wallet for yourself, by yourself is very easy. Asking someone help you to create a wallet is very risky. Have you ever known about this warning "Not your keys, not your bitcoins'?Bitcoin Q&A: Not your Keys, Not your Coins.The man in the video is the author of Mastering Bitcoin book that is available, free on Github too.Mastering Bitcoin book on Github.Learnmeabitcoin.com (Getting started for beginners with wallets).Recommended walletsHow to back up a seed phrase?.Creating a wallet by yourself. Doing it offline. Making your wallet back up. Trying to recover your wallet with backup.When you are done all those steps, you are ready to go with a safe wallet and also backups.

But if you really are a kid, then I guess I'll have to congratulate you because that means you're a part of the people that have a high IQ and you just feign ignorance so people aren't trying to get in your face too much and investing in bitcoin at such a young age would also mean that your parents care about you and your future.they probably meant that they are a kid or that they are young when it comes to forum or maybe crypto in generalQuote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMim a kid for this world  but my age is not. op is probably past the adolescence stage hence the reason why they might be struggling to navigate forum as technology has advanced but just try to read through this forum because you will learn a lot in here if you have any struggles with english then i suggest you find your own local board where you can converse with people more comfortably

comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: There's a lot of tutorials on the internet regarding about this matter. Don't ever ask for help to anyone when creating your own wallet, because there's a possibility that they know your private key and might steal your Bitcoin if ever you put any in that wallet. Creating a wallet is so easy, just do your research on what kind of wallet you're going to use, don't use exchanges wallet, not your keys, not your coins. Also, don't just randomly buy Bitcoin, DCA is the key.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 05:03:51 PMi exactly did what you advised.they just show me the path and send some links.anyway thanks for everythingIt can be overwhelming and confusing at first, so don't worry too much because everyone starts from there. And it looks like you're on the right track in searching for information. Learning is a process, and I've been through that too. Maybe you're already aware that this forum is a great place to find a wealth of information and helpful threads on various topics. If you're concerned about the language barrier, there's probably a local board where you come from, and I'm sure you'll improve with practice. Securing your wallet with your seed phrase is essential to keeping your funds safe. I hope you can keep yourself safe online.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: I don't know about others, but I personally sense that you are not that good with English, I will advice that you make use of translators, so that you can better communicate in clear terms, what truly you need help with, and I want to hope that, talking about you being helped to open a bitcoin wallet, is this forum, if this be true, then please understand that, this forum is a not a bitcoin wallet, but a place where we discuss about bitcoin and everything cryptocurrencies.But if actually, someone did help you to create a bitcoin wallet, then I advice you never to use that wallet, learn how to create one yourself, and only use wallets you created yourself, never trust your wallet keys or seed phrase with any third party, be it your brother or sister.And lastly, please learn to use the quote function properly, easy way is, since you are not yet familiar with how to properly quote, I will advice you don't try to snip out text from other user's comment you are quoting, you seem to end up sniping out important attributes when doing that, and it affects the entire quote.What to do is, just click the quote function from the thread, and type your comment underneath it, and click the post button, this I believe should solve the problem of broken quotes.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.If you are still a baby and wants to make baby steps and then adult ones, then it will be better for you to start from basic and that is what are the basic terms and there definitions and how do they actually work, In my time here a lot of things were new to me, I used not to engage in any discussion and I was simply joining bounties. And during that time I started to write articles which was also part of bounties. And to write articles we should have the knowledge first. So, before writing, I started to research about that project, and if I counter any unknown term I simple try to learn as much as I could and then move to other. In this journey you will get to know many terms but you have to be selective while reading them because my main aim was to get enough knowledge to write that article so I did no wonder around more than that. And I will suggest you to do the same.Learn the basics by researching and then keep them remember and then try to engage here with as many discussions as you can and make sure to be of some help, because useless posts will be counted as spam.

comments.author: Tigerheart3026
comments.body: Quote from: hollowdoor on December 07, 2023, 03:43:42 PMrecently i get help from some good people to open wallet for bitcoin.im a kid for this world but my age is not.May 25, 2018, 04:54:25 PM my account activation date.now i curious to know more about this world, how its work, how to start here.how can i help someone.that's fine some good people helped you to create bitcoin wallet, if you are newbie in crypto so don't believe to anyone in about your wallet, because they can also keep your private key, so it's a risk to seeking help to create private account. so many tutorial guideline videos in youtube just search on here.
